Package uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Components.DatabaseEntityIdentifier

Class DatabaseEntityIdentifier

java.lang.Object
uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Components.DatabaseEntityIdentifier.DatabaseEntityIdentifier
@Component
public class DatabaseEntityIdentifier
extends java.lang.Object
This can be used to find tables or columns (by providing a path string) within a given List of schemas. The path strings (e.g. "mySchema.myTable.myColumn") can be validated with the isValidTablePath and isValidColumnPath methods
Author:
Matthew Derbyshire

  • Method Details

    • isValidTablePath

      public boolean isValidTablePath​(java.lang.String stringToTest)
      Confirms if the given string is a valid table path (e.g. "mySchema.myTable")
      Parameters:
      stringToTest - This is the string that you want to confirm is a valid table path
      Returns:
      True if the given string is a valid table path, and false if not

    • isValidColumnPath

      public boolean isValidColumnPath​(java.lang.String stringToTest)
      Confirms if the given string is a valid column path (e.g. "mySchema.myTable.myColumn")
      Parameters:
      stringToTest - This is the string that you want to confirm is a valid column path
      Returns:
      True if the given string is a valid column path, and false if not

    • getTableAtPath

      public Table getTableAtPath​(java.util.List<Schema> schemas, java.lang.String path) throws UnprocessableEntityException
      Searches through a given List of schemas for a particular table
      Parameters:
      schemas - The List of Schema objects, to be searched through
      path - The table path for the table to be found (e.g. "mySchema.myTable")
      Returns:
      The Table instance that matches the given path string
      Throws:
      UnprocessableEntityException - Thrown if the given path is invalid, or if the schema/table isn't found

    • getColumnAtPath

      public Column getColumnAtPath​(java.util.List<Schema> schemas, java.lang.String path) throws UnprocessableEntityException
      Searches through a given List of schemas for a particular column
      Parameters:
      schemas - The List of Schema objects, to be searched through
      path - The column path for the column to be found (e.g. "mySchema.myTable.myColumn")
      Returns:
      The Column instance that matches the given path string
      Throws:
      UnprocessableEntityException - Thrown if the given path is invalid, or if the schema/table/column isn't found
